columnGroups.title: DataTable Column Enhancements
columnGroups.description: Additional helpers provided by the DataTable wrapper on top of TanStack columns.

items.name: type
items.description: Hints the default filter UI and formatting helpers to use for the column.

items.name: options
items.description: Select options shown when type='select'. Pairs nicely with custom filters.

items.name: align
items.description: Controls horizontal alignment for header, body, and footer cells.

items.name: wrapText
items.description: Controls whether text should wrap or truncate with ellipsis.

items.name: filterable
items.description: Enables column-specific filtering UI and passes state to custom components.

items.name: hideInExport
items.description: Exclude this column when generating CSV/Excel exports.

items.name: filterComponent
items.description: Override the default filter control with a fully custom React component.

items.name: editComponent
items.description: Provide an inline edit control distinct from the filter UI.

columnGroups.title: TanStack Column Properties
columnGroups.description: Core TanStack Table column options available through the DataTable wrapper.

items.name: accessorKey
items.description: Field name to read from each row for this column (alternative to accessorFn).

items.name: accessorFn
items.description: Derive the cell value from row data when accessorKey is insufficient.

items.name: header
items.description: Content shown in the header cell. Accepts strings, React nodes, or render functions.

items.name: footer
items.description: Footer renderer for aggregations or helper text.

items.name: cell
items.description: Render function for each cell, receiving TanStack cell helpers.

items.name: id
items.description: Optional unique identifier. Auto-generated from accessorKey when omitted.

items.name: size
items.description: Starting width in pixels used during initial layout.

items.name: minSize
items.description: Minimum width enforced while resizing.

items.name: maxSize
items.description: Maximum width allowed while resizing.

items.name: enableSorting
items.description: Allow the column to participate in sorting interactions.

items.name: enableResizing
items.description: Allow column width to be adjusted via drag handles.

items.name: enablePinning
items.description: Allow pinning this column to the left or right edge.

items.name: enableHiding
items.description: Expose this column to the column visibility menu.

items.name: enableGlobalFilter
items.description: Include this column when running the global search filter.

items.name: enableColumnFilter
items.description: Allow column-specific filtering state for this column.

items.name: sortingFn
items.description: Custom compare function run during column sorting.

items.name: sortDescFirst
items.description: Start sorting in descending order for the first toggle.

items.name: meta
items.description: Arbitrary metadata passed to header/cell/footer renderers.
